text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Today, I go see Maruzensky during<n>her dance practice,
and...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: One, two, and... finish! ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's only just learned this number,<n>but pulls it off
masterfully.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Phew... That felt good! This upbeat<n>song is my jam. ♪ My
body gets into<n>the rhythm so naturally.
choice_data_list: It was fun just watching you.
It was fun just watching you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You've got that gleam in your eyes...<n>just like when we first
met. Hehe, it<n>makes me laugh.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
You've got that gleam in your eyes...<n>just like when we first
met. Hehe, it<n>makes me laugh.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
But I'm happy you enjoyed it! "Have<n>fun" has become our
little motto,<n>hasn't it? ♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Whether dancing or racing, it's all<n>about having fun while
you do it!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Ding, dong, ding, dong...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's this late already? Guess<n>we're done for today then.
Plus I gotta<n>get going.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
What, feeling jealous? Don't<n>worry—it's not a date or
anything!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Actually, there's this car expo going<n>on... And!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
They're giving out miniature cars,<n>including Tata's model!
They're super<n>cute! I want one sooo bad.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
The giveaway starts at 7, but it's a<n>limited edition, so I gotta
hurry there!
choice_data_list: You'd better get there fast then.
You'd better get there fast then.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Right, sorry to rush off like this. I'll<n>see you tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Right, sorry to rush off like this. I'll<n>see you tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Oh, Maruzen! I'm so glad to see you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Ah, hey, kiddos! What's shaking?

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: You were just doing dance practice,right?! We really wanna see yourmoves!

text_block_list.name: Young Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Our instructor said your dancing's so<n>beautiful it'd be great
to learn from...<n>So, please! Pretty please!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Well... Hehe, I can't say no when you<n>ask so nicely, can I?
♪

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Yep, there's no substitute for their<n>cute little smiles. All right,
get ready,<n>'cause here I go!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Maruzensky decides to continue her<n>dance practice for the
younger<n>students.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Remembering how excited for the<n>expo she was, I look up
the event and<n>head over to get a miniature for her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The next day...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Another great day for training. ♪ I'm<n>all set! What's first on
the menu?
choice_data_list: Before we start, I have something for you.
Before we start, I have something for you.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hm? Is that?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I hold the miniature car up to<n>Maruzensky.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wha! Wait, you didn't... Did you go to<n>the show for me?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wha! Wait, you didn't... Did you go to<n>the show for me?!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Wasn't it far? And you must have<n>waited so long in line.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's all 'cause I wouldn't shut up<n>about it. I'm so sorry
you had to go all<n>the way there...
choice_data_list: Nah, I just wanted to make you happy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's all 'cause I wouldn't shut up<n>about it. I'm so sorry
you had to go all<n>the way there...
choice_data_list: Nah, I just wanted to make you happy.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aw, Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Aw, Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Well, you did! I'm as happy as can<n>be! Thank you!

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text:
Okay! What are you doing after<n>training? I need to return the
favor for<n>the miniature.

text_block_list.name: Maruzensky
text_block_list.text: Hehe... Get ready to have some mad<n>fun. ♪

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After training, Maruzensky and I go<n>for a drive in her prized
car.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The cool night's breeze blowing in<n>our hair, the occasional
close call...<n>This is quite the mad ride.
